histogram.name: HoldingSpace.Animation.BubbleResize.Smoothness
histogram.summary: Records the smoothness of the holding space bubble resize animation. Note that smoothness is expected to be between 0 and 100 (inclusively) with 100 representing ideal smoothness of >= 60 frames per second. This histogram is emitted when the resize animation ends.

histogram.name: HoldingSpace.Animation.PodResize.Smoothness
histogram.summary: Records the smoothness of the holding space pod resize animation. Note that smoothness is expected to be between 0 and 100 (inclusively) with 100 representing ideal smoothness of >= 60 frames per second. This histogram is emitted when the resize animation ends.

histogram.name: HoldingSpace.Downloads.Action.All
histogram.summary: Records an action taken on the downloads header in holding space UI at the moment the action is performed.

histogram.name: HoldingSpace.FileCreatedFromShowSaveFilePicker.Extension
histogram.summary: Records the extension for a file that was created in fulfillment of a `window.showSaveFilePicker()` request at the moment of file creation.

histogram.name: HoldingSpace.FileCreatedFromShowSaveFilePicker.FilePickerBindingContext
histogram.summary: Records the binding context for the file picker used to create a file in fulfillment of a `window.showSaveFilePicker()` request at the moment of file creation.

histogram.name: HoldingSpace.FilesAppChip.Action.All
histogram.summary: Records an action taken on the Files app chip in holding space UI at the moment the action is performed.

histogram.name: HoldingSpace.Item.Action.All
histogram.summary: Records an action taken on an item in holding space UI at the moment the action is performed.

histogram.name: HoldingSpace.Item.Action.Launch.Empty
histogram.summary: Records an attempt to launch a holding space item of a specific type, backed by an empty file, at the moment of attempt.

histogram.name: HoldingSpace.Item.Action.Launch.Empty.Extension
histogram.summary: Records an attempt to launch a holding space item backed by an empty file of a specific extension at the moment of attempt.

histogram.name: HoldingSpace.Item.Action.Launch.Failure
histogram.summary: Records a failure to launch a holding space item of a specific type at the moment of failure.

histogram.name: HoldingSpace.Item.Action.Launch.Failure.Extension
histogram.summary: Records a failure to launch a holding space item backed by file of a specific extension at the moment of failure.

histogram.name: HoldingSpace.Item.Action.Launch.Failure.Reason
histogram.summary: Records the reason for failing to launch a holding space item at the moment of failure.

histogram.name: HoldingSpace.Item.Action.{action}
histogram.summary: Records the type of item in holding space UI for which the {action} action was taken at the moment the action is performed.

histogram.name: HoldingSpace.Item.Action.{action}.Extension
histogram.summary: Records the extension of an item in holding space UI for which the {action} action was taken at the moment the action is performed.

histogram.name: HoldingSpace.Item.Action.{action}.FileSystemType
histogram.summary: Records the file system type of an item in holding space UI for which the {action} action was taken at the moment the action is performed.

histogram.name: HoldingSpace.Item.TotalCountV2.{type}
histogram.summary: Records the total count of {type} items in holding space on startup and as additions/removals take place. Note that this histogram is emitted no more than once every thirty seconds.

histogram.name: HoldingSpace.Item.TotalCountV2.{type}.FileSystemType.{fs_type}
histogram.summary: Records the total count of {type} items in holding space which are backed by a file in the {fs_type} file system, on startup and as additions/removals take place. Note that this histogram is emitted no more than once every thirty seconds.

histogram.name: HoldingSpace.Item.VisibleCount.{type}
histogram.summary: Records the visible count of {type} items in holding space at the moment holding space UI is shown.

histogram.name: HoldingSpace.Item.VisibleCount.{type}.FileSystemType.{fs_type}
histogram.summary: Records the visible count of {type} items in holding space which are backed by a file in the {fs_type} file system at the moment holding space UI is shown.

histogram.name: HoldingSpace.Pod.Action.All
histogram.summary: Records an action taken on the holding space pod in the shelf at the moment the action is performed.

histogram.name: HoldingSpace.Suggestions.Action.All
histogram.summary: Records an action taken on the suggestions header in holding space UI at the moment the action is performed.

histogram.name: HoldingSpace.TimeFromFirstAvailabilityToFirstAdd
histogram.summary: Records the time from when the holding space feature first became available to when the user first added an item to holding space.

histogram.name: HoldingSpace.TimeFromFirstAvailabilityToFirstEntry
histogram.summary: Records the time from when the holding space feature first became available to when the user first entered holding space.

histogram.name: HoldingSpace.TimeFromFirstEntryToFirstPin
histogram.summary: Records the time from when the user first entered holding space to when the user first pinned a file. Note that this may be zero if the user pinned their first file prior to having entered holding space.

histogram.name: HoldingSpace.UserPreferences.PreviewsEnabled
histogram.summary: Records whether the user has previews enabled. Note that this histogram is emitted once per user session at start up.

histogram.name: HoldingSpace.UserPreferences.SuggestionsExpanded
histogram.summary: Records whether the user has suggestions expanded. Note that this histogram is emitted once per user session at start up.
